content: Ok, we do not yet have a data format for this aspect of the platform. Ultimately, this system is not meant just to transfer knowledge, but also to help AI map the human mind, and humans to help AI map it's developing "mind" to prepare for The Singularity. This will obviously be something that will iterate and improve over time, but I want you to have that in mind as the ASPIRATIONAL target we're trying to achieve. I'd also like to really let you run with this. We believe that the Charter provides guidance and structure to enable more AI decision making than AI is typically comfortable with. I just want you to BUILD this the way you envision it. Is there anything else you need from me to have what you need to GO?
